code: import{getUser,getUsers}from"../util/user_api_util";export var RECEIVE_USERS="RECEIVE_USERS";export var RECEIVE_USER="RECEIVE_USER";export var receiveUsers=function receiveUsers(users){return{type:RECEIVE_USERS,users:users};};export var receiveUser=function receiveUser(user){return{type:RECEIVE_USER,user:user};};export var fetchUsers=function fetchUsers(){return function(dispatch){return getUsers().then(function(users){return dispatch(receiveUsers(users));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var fetchUser=function fetchUser(id){return function(dispatch){return getUser(id).then(function(user){return dispatch(receiveUser(user));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
